title: DJ Sona uses default Sona voice
body: Starting off a match with DJ Sona has her automatically start on Kinetic, and uses her voice made for the skin. When you toggle through the songs and come back to Kinetic she starts to speak with her voice from her default skin. This has happened in two different games now. Definitely not a gamebreaking bug by any means, but it kinda ruins the feel of the skin, and it'd be great if you could look into this. Thanks {{champion:37}}

replies.body:
Hey AlphaRumpRanger,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue and are investigating. ^-^
Katey, is it just me or does DJ sona seem to get a lot of bug reports, particularly with her sound?

The higher the skin tier, the more bells and whistles they have, which means there are instances where things could break.

The audio tech we use for DJ Sona is something no other skin has, and it's something we built from the ground up. That said, it's still fairly new, and there are edge cases where something may not work as intended. 

The bug reports have been extremely helpful in helping us iron out the odd cases that may exist.
Earlier I noticed around mid game her taunts and default sound pack goes back to her original skins presets

There's currently an issue regarding Lulu's Polymorph and DJ Sona's default VO. Swapping forms resolves this one. Is this potentially what you're referring to? 

If not, we're still looking into OP's report.

Can confirm that one. Was DJ Sona in an ARAM recently, Lulu Polymorphed me, and then I was using Sona's default VO for a bit. It went back to DJ after a short time (not sure what triggered that), but I was pretty pissed at that Lulu.

I would be, too! :P

You're able to get the proper VO back by using /toggle again. :] (Just a workaround for now - we're working on figuring out what's happening here.)
This actually happened to me as Sona against a Lulu. The default VO stuck, and for some reason I couldn't even use the command /toggle ;-;
If you were recently in combat, you won't be able to swap to a different stance. Could this possibly be what happened?
I think I had just come back from a recall, so no.

Interesting. 

I personally logged the Lulu Polymorph issue and had a 100% reproduction rate that swapping forms allowed for the proper sound to begin playing again. That said, I was able to /toggle /g, etc every time as well. 

If you have this happen again, would you mind pinging me about it?
It might be a while (don't play support that often anymore), but sure.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GAuAvAUG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-09T00:15:05.314+0000)
>
> Hey AlphaRumpRanger,
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue and are investigating. ^-^

Thanks for the response :)
I had this issue once before but it never came up again. BUT I had another issue where she was using Jinx's voice for the whole match (Only when ulting)
Yup, I've noticed the same problems as well, and other problems with Guquin Sona having default particle sounds and arcade MF having regular MF sounds, just skins with sounds seem to be affected.
